CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 10, 1941, pg. 8 reads: "When Lilas King and Clarence Morton married last week it was a happy occasion. Here are pictured the bridal party and some friends...Margaret Brown, Harry Morton Otelia King, Grover Johnson, Evelyn Jones, members of the wedding party.- Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of King - Morton wedding party, from left: Margaret Brown, Harry Morton, Otelia King, Grover Johnson, and Evelyn Jones, in King home
